channel.title: Client game frame problem?
channel.description:
I've tried to fix this, but I can't seem to get it right. This is a 317 PI. This client does have a changable game frame btw! (377, 474, 483, 508, 525, 565) I want to keep it on 525, which is the one in the images, but the clan chat and log out button are mixed. I want this clan chat button to open the clan chat \/ \/ \/ \/ http://i.imgur.com/IaYzN.jpg
And I don't even want this door here, and also, I want the X at the top right(log out) to work, but it does nothing. http://i.imgur.com/UUtJf.jpg

Try to fix the Client Bution, im not sure cuz im not a Client coder…[/quote]
